comment: Prof Clark is very nice and makes class enjoyable! The content was more interesting than I thought it would be. Definitely a class I looked forward to. Easy A for completing the assignments. Works w/ you on dates to turn in any missed assignments. Weekly quizzes on the ppt or readings. Way better option than music or theater appreciation!
I really enjoyed taking Dr. Clarks class. She is a bit weird and quirky but honestly, it makes boring classes more fun. It can be hard to keep up with her sometimes and she tends to ramble.

I took Analysis and Criticism of Dance with Prof. Clark, and you would assume the class would be challenging and writing heavy. Unfortunately, she did not teach at a collegiate level. We were taught like children and played elementary games in class. She did not challenge me once nor did I learn much about the class's curriculum. Waste of my time.
